attributes.action: UK government must respect MSPs rejection to EU Withdrawal Bill
attributes.additional_details: Theresa May had also said this afternoon, that voting to stay part of the United Kingdom was the democratic will of the Scottish people, but voting to remain in the EU was also our democratic will too.  So now, the government must listen to what the people really want.
attributes.background: Members of the Scottish Parliament have rejected the UK governments Brexit, because it represents a 'power-grab' in devolved powers.  So, I would call on the government to work with all the devolved of the UK governments and respect what our MSPs voted against.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you mean by "UK government must respect MSPs rejection to EU Withdrawal Bill".

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
